item.description:
Note: The hall seats 100. WRNEC already has over 100 reservations for The RAW-luck buffet and lecture. Only 3 of the 17 people who RSVPd from this site followed the instructions below by calling or emailing Betsy. Please call Betsy at 781-899-6664 or email her at Betsy@rawnewenglandcommunity.com to confirm your reservation. There are a number of no shows. We don't want to turn anyone away. Standing room is available. It's recommended that you arrive at 5:30 at the latest.


GREENS CAN SAVE YOUR LIFE

Victoria Boutenko, award-winning author of several best-selling books on raw and living foods and popular speaker from Ashland, Oregon, will present her inspiring new lecture "GREENS CAN SAVE YOUR LIFE" at the next Waltham Raw New England Community dinner, on Tuesday, December 11, from 7 to 9 PM following the 5:30 PM potluck dinner.

Victoria Boutenko's talk will be packed with revolutionary information.
The latest scientific research on the raw food diet;
The signs of malnourishment and how to avoid it;
Staying on a raw diet in the midst of temptations;
Helping children to eat healthfully;
Common mistakes that occur on a raw food diet;
Green smoothies - an easy way to enjoy greens and much more!
Come and Be Motivated To Change Your Life!

All those attending are requested to bring a raw, organic, unprocessed, non-animal, non-honey based ready- to-serve dish for 6 - 8 people. Please bring serving utensils labeled with your name and a typed or neatly written recipe to display next to your dish. For recipe ideas, go to http://www.rawnewengl....

The cost is $10 per person, $5 for members. Price includes a green smoothie and handouts.

For questions and reservations, contact Betsy Bragg by email at betsy@rawnewenglandcommunity.com or call 781-899-6664 or 617-835-2913.
Be sure to give your postal address, phone number & email. All are invited to our buffet and lecture!
item.name: Greens can Save Your Life
